trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref> should handle a custom text element.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref> skal behandle et egendefinert element.

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom text element, you can use the TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute attribute to specify that the element should be treated as a single, unbreakable entity.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter et egendefinert element, kan du bruke attributtet TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute til å angi at elementet skal behandles som en enkelt, unbreakable enhet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A> properties are set to `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> preserves the boundaries and content of the element when the user edits the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A>egenskapene til `false`, en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>beholder grensene og innholdet i elementet når brukeren redigerer <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsTypographicOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute.IsMergeable%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, the custom element behaves similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.
trans-unit.target: Generelt fungerer egendefinerte elementet ligner <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>

trans-unit.source: The following behavior occurs when you use this class and set both of its properties to `false`: - When a user copies and pastes a part of the content in a custom element, the formatting of the copied text is not preserved.
trans-unit.target: Skjer følgende når du bruker denne klassen, og angi begge egenskapene til `false`: – når en bruker kopierer og limer inn en del av innholdet i et egendefinert element, formatering inn kopierte opprettholdes ikke.

trans-unit.source: - When a user types before or after the content of the custom element, the new content does not acquire the custom element's formatting information.
trans-unit.target: -Når en bruker skriver før eller etter innholdet i egendefinert element, det nye innholdet ikke hente informasjon om egendefinerte elementet-formatering.

trans-unit.source: - The user cannot insert a line break in the custom element.
trans-unit.target: -Brukeren kan ikke sette inn linjeskift i egendefinerte elementet.

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> method and set `preserveTextElements` to `true` to preserve the custom element and property values when you serialize it to the disk or clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter et egendefinert element, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>metoden og sett `preserveTextElements` til `true` å beholde de egendefinerte elementet og egenskapsverdier når du serialisere den til disk eller utklippstavlen.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange.Save%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref> can merge two adjacent text elements.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref> kan slå sammen to tilstøtende tekst-elementer.

trans-unit.source: When IsMergeable is `true`, the decision to combine adjacent text elements that have identical property values is left up to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Når IsMergeable er `true`, beslutningstreet å kombinere tilstøtende tekst-elementer som har identiske verdier står opptil <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: When IsMergeable is `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> does not combine two adjacent text elements.
trans-unit.target: Når IsMergeable er `false`, en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>ikke slå sammen to tilstøtende tekst-elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"></xref> is free to merge adjacent custom text elements that have identical property values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox"> </xref> er fri til å slå sammen tilstøtende egendefinerte tekst-elementer som har identiske verdier; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text element provides formatting on a character basis, or if the formatting applies to the entire element.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om elementet tekst gir formatering på tegn basis, eller om formateringen gjelder for hele elementet.

trans-unit.source: When IsTypographicOnly is `true` and the user copies and pastes part of the content of a custom text element, the formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Når IsTypographicOnly er `true` og brukeren kopierer og limer inn en del av innholdet i et egendefinert element, formateringen beholdes.

trans-unit.source: When IsTypographicOnly is `false`, the formatting is preserved only if the user copies and pastes all of the content of the custom text element.
trans-unit.target: Når IsTypographicOnly er `false`, formateringen opprettholdes bare hvis brukeren kopierer og limer inn hele innholdet i elementet egendefinert tekst.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElementEditingBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if formatting should apply to the individual characters; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the formatting should apply to the entire element.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis formatering skal gjelde for individuelle tegn. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis formateringen skal gjelde for hele elementet.
